definition[0]: to stop doing, producing, or providing something
definition[1]: to stop doing, making, or providing something that you have regularly done, made, or provided until now
example[2]: The guitar manufacturer discontinued almost their entire range to concentrate on the RG450 and JEM series.
example[3]: The bus service is being discontinued as of March 1st.
example[4]: This is a discontinued line (=product that is no longer being made) that we are selling off cheaply.
